title: How to Use a Lavender Sachet

steps.headline: Use the sachet to scent your drawers and keep insects away.
steps.description: Tuck it in other places such as the bureau, a chest, in the car or in a meeting room.

steps.headline: Try making an air freshener out of a lavender sachet.
steps.description: Hang it in a window or some other place where there is an airflow.

steps.headline: Eliminate fatigue by placing the sachet near your head or sitting across your eyes while lying down in a darkened room.
steps.description: Do this for about half an hour.

steps.headline: Give lavender sachets as a gift.
steps.description: Large ones make a gift on their own, while smaller ones are great additions to a basket.

steps.headline: Use it as a bath sachet.
Throw a sachet in with the dryer.
steps.description: This will help to make clothes smell fresh and also scents the surrounding air. If your laundry is in a basement, the the combination of the aroma and the heat from the dryer can help to dispel moldy or other rank smells in the basement area.

steps.headline: Tuck a sachet under your pillow to help induce sweet and peaceful dreams.

text: Use the sachet to scent your drawers and keep insects away. Tuck it in other places such as the bureau, a chest, in the car or in a meeting room. Try making an air freshener out of a lavender sachet. Hang it in a window or some other place where there is an airflow. Eliminate fatigue by placing the sachet near your head or sitting across your eyes while lying down in a darkened room. Do this for about half an hour. Give lavender sachets as a gift. Large ones make a gift on their own, while smaller ones are great additions to a basket. Use it as a bath sachet.  Throw a sachet in with the dryer. This will help to make clothes smell fresh and also scents the surrounding air. If your laundry is in a basement, the the combination of the aroma and the heat from the dryer can help to dispel moldy or other rank smells in the basement area. Tuck a sachet under your pillow to help induce sweet and peaceful dreams.
